data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: First impressions may be more accurate than previously thought. In a new ____, ____ were ____ to ____ tell ____ a ____ was ____ or ____ simply ____ observing ____ face ____ a ____ position. It seems that continued use of certain muscles, such as those used for smiling, permanently changes the resting state of a face.
data.partBlankContent: First impressions may be more accurate than previously thought. In a new st___, partic______ were ab__ to reli____ tell i_ a per___ was ri__ or po__ simply b_ observing th___ face i_ a neu____ position. It seems that continued use of certain muscles, such as those used for smiling, permanently changes the resting state of a face.
data.answer: 第一印象可能比之前认为的更准确。在一项新的研究中，参与者只需观察一个人处于中立位置的脸，就能可靠地判断出他是富人还是穷人。似乎持续使用某些肌肉，比如那些用于微笑的肌肉，会永久地改变面部的静止状态。
